work.name: AInvoice
work.description: AInvoice is a SaaS startup that automates invoice, packing list, and order form processing using AI and traditional data processing techniques.

Implemented full-stack features in our NextJS + MySQL stack to meet business objectives and ensure tenant satisfaction.
Streamlined task management processes to boost team productivity and project tracking.

highlights: Led backend development for a SaaS RV Management Platform using a modern tech stack including NestJS and Next.js.
